attributes.additional_details: The acceptance of £88,000 from Wonga by the Tory party brings politics into disrepute. Accepting donations from  a company that charges the poorest in society to further their decimation of the working classes is not only repugnant; but illustrates the Tory parties total lack of those that do know the price of bread and milk despite no Eton education. This petition require that all political party donations from Wonga be returned to said company.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Political Party not for HM Government
